headline.main: SENATE LINES HOLD; Advocates of Neutrality Revision Say Sinking Solidifies 'Majority'

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 31 -- Administration leaders said today that the sinking of the destroyer Reuben James had solidified a "safe majority" in a grim determination to remove all restraints from America's full exercise of the right of freedom of the seas.
abstract: Sens Wheeler and Johnson tilt with Sen Barkley on Sen failure to act on foreign propaganda resolution, Sen
